page.title: 02Population Flintham.
page.content:
There are 236 people living in the village of Flintham: 23 under 12 yrs; 30 up to 18 yrs; 38 up to 34 yrs; 110 up to 60 yrs & 35 over 65 yrs. These figures do not include Inholms Gardens or Coney Grey Spinney which are in the process of being sold by the MOD and not all the houses have been occupied.
Of the 236 people, 18 families have lived in the village for less than 5 years - 52 people in all.
The working population is mainly ABC1 whereas the retired are mainly C2DE.
The number of children has dropped over the last few years - hopefully more families with children will move into the village as the RAF houses are sold.
